** Kouhai.title: ** Kouhai
** Kouhai.detail:
A special governmental program has been introduced to counteract the declining birth rates of demi-human races suffering due to a lack of male members. Through a so-called "assistance system," randomly selected humans are required to mate with designated partners—be it elves, sirens, or even dragons.

Iris Thea Eaderlindt, an elven princess known for her open-mindedness and friendly attitude towards humans, is transferred to the Ark Metropolitan Academy. Coincidentally, her new teacher has been selected as her mating partner. Anxious yet determined to fulfill her duty of securing the future of her race, she starts partaking in sexual activities with him. To her surprise, Iris discovers that her partner's ancestors were orcs, well known for their extraordinary sexual prowess.

As more demi-human students join the class and find out about their teacher's "side job," it becomes increasingly difficult for Iris to keep her partner's attention solely on her.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

12 Zhi Wenzi He 5 Geren.detail: Midsummer is coming, mosquitoes and flies are rampant. Somewhere, in the air not far from the ground, 12 mosquitoes lined up neatly, waiting for the appearance of their prey. Soon, a tall man appeared. When caught off guard, the mosquito army whizzed down and besieged the man. He was attacked from head to toe all over his body. The man thought for a while, and felt that it was too bad for a person to be bitten. He counted the number of mosquitoes and instantly came up with a good way. The man brought in a solid man again, and the mosquito army attacked again. The difference was that each person was only attacked by 6 mosquitoes. The tall man was delighted for a while, but the honest man tried to reduce the loss, so he found another victim. In the third, until the fifth man appeared, the absolute average balance was completely broken...(translated from douban)

2012 Ka Ku Chunwan Zhi Long Xing Tianxia.title: 2012 Ka Ku Chunwan Zhi Long Xing Tianxia
2012 Ka Ku Chunwan Zhi Long Xing Tianxia.detail:
The dragon clan suffered the biggest crisis in two thousand years. In order to protect the dragon clan, the wife of the dragon king decided to sacrifice herself and inject all power into the dragon clan’s weapon-dragon armor. The dragon king used the power of the dragon armor to defeat the rebels. But the dragon prince believed that the dragon king did not protect his mother, so there was always a deep grudge between him and his father. At the moment, the Dragon King has created a chance to escape for the prince, and the prince has made many friends during his adventures. In his interactions with them, the prince understands the importance of family. In the end, with the help of his friends, the prince finally succeeded in saving the dragon clan and reconciled with his father. 
(translated from baidu baike)

2015 Chunjie Dongman Da Lianhuan.title: 2015 Chunjie Dongman Da Lianhuan
2015 Chunjie Dongman Da Lianhuan.detail:
The animation paradise inhabited by the Chinese zodiac will be in charge of Leyangyang this year. In the spirit of sharing with the world, Le Yang Yang is looking for generals to help organize the Spring Festival Gala. Unexpectedly, when he came to the animation park, he found that he had been messed up by the naughty Nian Beast. On the other hand, the general's grandfather and veteran saw Nian Beast passing by the door. Just under one chase, a group of cartoon characters shuttled through various cartoon worlds. During the process, Nian Beast knew his mistakes, and everyone did not care about the past. A group of cartoon characters realized the spirit of fairness, integrity, friendliness, harmony, civilization, care, and rule of law, and worked together to solve the difficulties and returned to the animation paradise for the New Year. 
(translated from tenceng(https://v.qq.com/))

24H.title: 24H
24H.detail:
HIFANA's unique live performances and track-making skills have inspired club music fans around the globe. Their full-length album "24H" was released on July 28, 2010. Based on the concept of "1 day : 24 hours," the album is made up of 12 audio tracks plus 12 video tracks featuring different events that occur throughout the day.

HIFANA has always pursued an original musical style, which could be called "Tokyo-born Japanese Hybrid Breakbeats," mixing various sounds with freestyle editing. In this album, they’ve transcended to another level, turning 12 fresh, tight tracks, led by "HANABEAM," based on the explosive sounds of fireworks. Guest artists include UA, Spinna B-ILL, Twigy, Chinza Dopeness, Leyona, Yohei Miyake, Mitsuyoshi Azuma, and Keyco.

The DVD includes 12 videos, one for each track on the album. Over 15 up-and-coming visual creators contributed to the project with HIFANA and W+K Tokyo Lab’s partnership at the core, resulting in some intense collaborations.

Refer to More Info section for details.

(Source: Official website)

81 Hao Nongchang Zhi Baowei Mai Ji.title: 81 Hao Nongchang Zhi Baowei Mai Ji
81 Hao Nongchang Zhi Baowei Mai Ji.detail:
There is an isolated paradise in the barren desert called Farm No. 81. A long time ago, an alien elf accidentally fell here. He was called Mai Card. The child Wang Xiaobao, the cute and cowardly Dandan, and the often confused Bobo are MaiCard's best friends. Children have only one dream, that is "flying".
　　Under the cover of the night, the field mice stealing food group are sneaking into the farm to steal food, and the terrible flying devil also rushes into the farm to perform a secret mission-catching wheat cards. Farm 81, immersed in darkness, is perilous. The four friends who saw all this knew that it was time to take off, fighting for their dreams and homeland! Everything is ready, the four friends fly into the sky in the ultimate fighter, the farm is caught in a fierce air battle. They used their ingenuity to defeat all enemies and defend Mai Card and their homeland.
(translated from douban)

81 Hao Nongchang Zhi Fengkuang De Mai Ji.detail:
While the entire farm was still immersed in the joy of the successful development of Superpower, evil and powerful alien monsters invaded Farm 81.
　　 After everyone worked together to repel the first wave of attacks by alien monsters, they all blindly believed in the power of Superpower and gradually forgot the existence of the crisis, but Xiaobao found traces of alien monsters on the farm.
　　 Facing the distrust of the people, the broken friendship with the Maccard, the approaching monsters, and the confusing true and false friends. Xiaobao resolutely embarked on the difficult and dangerous path of defending friendship and defending the farm. Can he regain his trust? Can you restore the friendship with McCard? Can you defeat a powerful alien monster? Everything is just beginning.
(translated from douban)

A Fa Bei Leyuan Zhi Mohuan Shikong.detail:

Kiki helped Kaka complete the task of the elf, and in return, Kaka took Kiki to Alfabe Paradise. The magic giant Alfabe is the master of Alfabe Paradise and the teacher of the children. And Qiqi's classmates turned out to be elves with 26 letters. Alfabe can fly and there are many incredible magics, so everything becomes lively and interesting. There are two grammatical difficulties with intransitive verbs; the magic grapes in the western town, the bigeye fish in the underwater world, and the big-nosed uncle looking for memories...what surprises will they bring to Kiki?
(translated from youku)

A Fu Xun Gui Ji.title: A Fu Xun Gui Ji
A Fu Xun Gui Ji.detail:
In 2130, human beings forgot the virtues and society fell into turmoil. In order to save the world, the top scientist Dr. Tianji extracted the virtue energy from the ancient moral education classic "Disciple Guidance", created a magical elf-Afu, and sent it back to collect the virtue energy. Ah Fu returned to 2013 and met Rongzai, who had just started kindergarten, and helped each other with Rongzai and his friends, and successfully collected virtue energy. Dr. Doudou, the old opponent of Dr. Tianji, intends to destroy Dr. Tianji's plan and plunge the world into darkness. With the efforts of Ah Fu and others, Dr. Doudou was eventually knocked down and probated. The dark clouds covering the future world are dissipating. 
(translated from iqiyi)

A Kite.title: A Kite
A Kite.detail:
After her parents were brutally murdered, school girl Sawa was taken into custody by Akai and Kanie, a pair of detectives assigned to her case. Corrupt and immoral, they train the girl to become a weapon, dangling the promise of vengeance in front of the hapless orphan. From celebrities and politicians to influential businessmen, Sawa is tasked with assassinating targets selected arbitrarily by her crooked overseers. She executes every mission without fail, and her distinctive weapon has become infamous among the city's police officers.

Physically abused by Akai, who is no more righteous than her victims, Sawa begins to dream of a life unhindered by the shadow of her "guardians." One day, Sawa meets Oburi, a fellow orphan and vigilante. They quickly form a bond born of desperation and disgruntlement at the unjust world, envisioning a future free from the stain of murder.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

A Mao Gushi.detail:

He has a group of little friends who are also only children-his "follower" Xiaopi, the quiet Lanlan, the greedy and show-off fat beans, the overbearing tank, and two little pets-beautiful, elegant, The arrogant little white cat Snowball and funny-looking but faithful, good-tempered puppy hairballs. A Mi Luo Ge Hai Qi Yuan.title: A Mi Luo Ge Hai Qi Yuan
A Mi Luo Ge Hai Qi Yuan.detail:
Ami Luo, a 6-year-old Zhuang girl, travels with her parents to Yufeng Mountain, the hometown of Liu Sanjie. Under the guidance of the mysterious nature, Amiruo accidentally awakened the magic flute spirit that had been sleeping for a thousand years and became its new owner. The magic flute spirit passed the sapphire hydrangea passed down by the third sister Liu to the new owner Ami Luo. After the evil night elf king learned that the new owner of the sapphire hydrangea had appeared, he sent his subordinate Xiao Hei to lure Amilo and his party into the fairy kingdom. In the ancient city of the Elf Kingdom, Amiluo and his party teamed up with the Elf Queen and Elf Princess to defeat the evil night elf king.

A U.title: A U
A U.detail: A U is a kid next door, he is clever, clever, mischievous, has endless spooky ideas, countless funny things, and brings constant laughter. U's practical ability is far better than the ability to learn classroom knowledge. Ah U is caring, likes to help others, and at the same time loves to be public, likes to show the limelight, often kindly do bad things, often get embarrassed. Ah U has a group of super partners. Fat boy-U's super fan, honest and cute, but when he encounters food, he will burst out with amazing power. Amei-beautiful and cute, good grades, pursuit of perfection, is a role model for students. Man-in-law-she is impatient and easily agitated, but she is straightforward, full of responsibility and sense of justice. There is also a serious all-purpose teacher-Teacher A. In the study and family life, U and his friends have had countless funny things. In these things, U showed everyone his cleverness and nonsensicalness, and in various funny stories, they gained growth and shared the joy of growth.(translated form youku)

A U De Fannao.title: A U De Fannao
A U De Fannao.detail: A U is a five-year-old child in Hangzhou, living with his parents and an intelligent robot Tuzhi. As he grows up day by day, Ah U finds that he has added a lot of troubles. His good friends-Pang Dongdong, Amei, and Lan Yinbo also have various problems and problems. They don't know how to manage their emotions, and they are not good at interacting with others. Even among partners, they sometimes have different opinions and small frictions. Teachers and moms and dads saw these troubles on the children and began to guide and educate them in various interesting ways. Sometimes Tuzhi would also use his wisdom to cooperate. In the end, under the guidance of parents and teachers, and the efforts of Ayou and his friends, these growing problems have been resolved.(translated from youku)

A U Xue Kexue.title: A U Xue Kexue
A U Xue Kexue.detail:
This film is an extension of the "A You" animation series, adapted from the "Science Literacy Reader for Primary School Students" published by Science Popularization Publishing House. It presents popular science knowledge to the audience with a humorous storyline, so that children can learn to think like a scientist . A group of children, mainly U, are curious about nature and social life, and they are actively exploring. Through the answers of teachers and parents, they have learned a lot of interesting scientific knowledge. The whole film is humorous and funny without losing a rigorous scientific attitude, allowing children to learn knowledge in laughter and truly entertaining.
(translated from youku)

A U Zhi Mengxiang Xilie.title: A U Zhi Mengxiang Xilie
A U Zhi Mengxiang Xilie.detail: "A U's Dream Series" tells a series of warm little stories between U and his companions. What is reflected in the story is the spiritual temperament that all children possess: courage, love, self-denial, trust, and mutual help. What we have seen is the case of U, but we can feel the commonality between children's innocence and childlikeness, and we can see the big from the small. The images of children in this series of short films are cute, healthy, positive and full of truth, goodness and beauty. This film is a public welfare animation short, which is a fun and entertaining film, and conveys positive energy in laughter.(translated from youku)

A U Zhi Shen Qihuan Jing.title: A U Zhi Shen Qihuan Jing
A U Zhi Shen Qihuan Jing.detail:
The Doctor of Agriculture invented a super carrot, and he locked it in the nutrition cabin. But the careless doctor forgot the password to open the cabin. The radish cannot stay in the nutrition cabin for a long time, it must be taken out within 30 days. Another way to open the nutrition cabin is to complete the phantom mirror mission. Therefore, the doctor handed over this task to U and his friends Fat Tsai, A Mei and the man-in-law. But the three rabbits headed by Tu Fei had long been salivating on the turnips, and they snatched the phantom mirror. In order to open the nutrition cabin to get the carrot before the rabbit, the doctor gave U and the others another phantom mirror. The children and the rabbits opened the magic mirror and kept getting the task guidance: decrypt the pinyin of Chinese characters to get the location of the next task; search for the jigsaw puzzle to get the location of the next task; complete the English letter connection to get the location of the next task... The rabbits will make trouble when U is doing task analysis. U also relies on his own ingenuity to defeat the rabbit. As a result, a humorous competition was staged.
(translated form youku)

However, Kurono notices Ohashi's feelings. In order to incite him into confessing his feelings to her, Kurono molests Tamaki and makes her wait on him as she is. As she was sexually excited, she gives off a female's scent, which, in turn, excites Ohashi. Meanwhile, Tomoe, a friend of Kurono's appears... Will Ohashi be able to confess his love to Tamaki?

Advancer Tina.title: Advancer Tina
Advancer Tina.detail:
There is something very dangerous about planet Omega 13. Whatever it is, it's been killing Advancers sent out, one by one, to investigate. The Domestic Union of Arms is perplexed, so top DUA officer Mugal decides to give the job to the most dangerous, most independent, and most expendable Advancer they could find.

They find such an Advancer in the renegade Tina Owens. Currently incarcerated with a 2,000 year sentence for blowing up a planet, she is given a tempting offer. Instead of rotting in her cell, if she'll go to Omega 13, find and destroy any threats on the planet, and determine any exploitable resources for the Allied Earth Government, they'll let her go. 

Knowing how dangerous Omega 13 appears to be (and thinking about what has yet to be discovered), how would you decide? Tina takes the job, and she sets off for the planet. 

(Source: AnimeNfo)

Aggressive Retsuko (ONA) 2nd Season.title: Aggressive Retsuko (ONA) 2nd Season
Aggressive Retsuko (ONA) 2nd Season.detail:
Red panda Retsuko continues to work at her cyclic office job, with the occasional stress-venting via death metal karaoke on the side. With the company of her newfound friends Gori and Washimi, life is more enjoyable than ever before. But some new shake-ups to her status quo threaten to add more stress to her life. At the office, new employee Anai seems like a fine addition to the company. Yet when Retsuko is placed in charge of his training, she finds that beneath his steadfast dedication, he may pose a threat to the stability of the workplace. Meanwhile, at home, Retsuko's mother pays an abrupt visit, fully intent on having her daughter finally settle down and find a man. With this in mind, she sets Retsuko up for various marriage appointments, much to her chagrin.

Now, Retsuko finds all the more reasons to head to the karaoke bar and unleash her furious diatribes. However, knowing that this will not truly solve her problems, she decides to make a more spontaneous choice to avoid her issues. And so, Retsuko finds herself set upon another self-reflecting journey, coming to learn more about herself and love, with the ever cathartic support of death metal karaoke.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

Agu Dun Ba De Gushi.title: Agu Dun Ba De Gushi
Agu Dun Ba De Gushi.detail:
There is an ordinary small village in the Shannan area of the snow-covered plateau. The villagers have been living ordinary lives for generations, step by step, landlords collecting rent, farmers farming, herders grazing, and groceries walking streets and alleys. There is also a small village at the entrance of the village. teahouse. Suddenly one day, a wandering man-Agutumba, came from nowhere, and broke the peaceful life of the villagers, and the story began here. Agutonba usually seems to be idle, but in fact he is a very smart person. Usually solve all kinds of troubles for the people in the village, humorous, full of sense of justice, and bring a lot of fun to everyone's life. Gradually, Agutunba was trusted by the villagers, and the relationship between the people in the village became more and more friendly. However, behind this joy, a shadow quietly focused on Agutunba... 
(translated from iqiyi)

Ai Doll.detail:
The story of young Rachel is a sad one. Orphaned as a small child, abused by a jealous rival, and the object of lust by those who are supposed to be caretakers, she still tries to maintain a positive attitude about her future. Aided by her only friend Beth, her budding romance with Prince Andrew falls under jeopardy when a distant relative whisks her away for purposes unknown.

Ai Jingling Le Ji Er.detail:
The Tammy Witch of the Academy of Magic asks Le Jier to take the angel of love to the earth to complete the task of collecting the energy of love, so Le Jier stumbles to the earth with the angel of love and the magic box. The Demon Queen also awakened from the seal, which had a huge impact on the earth and the Magic Academy! In order to save her friends, Le Jier decided to sacrifice herself, but she did not expect that this would instead collect all kinds of love. "Ari Baba Positive Energy Journey" takes the historical and cultural city of China as the background, closely integrates traditional culture with contemporary cultural tourism, and highly summarizes the profound connotation of Chinese culture thought from the perspective of modern people. Ai Lun Jiaoshou De Mofa Zhipai.detail:
Human beings are a very magical group. They have accumulated a starry shining civilization, and the destruction they have made has caused the earth to suffer. The curious Lily and her friends have a lot of knowledge about this, such as what is love, friendship, witchcraft, fear, belief... Why do humans have children, why the world is not equal, why war broke out, we How to treat money and so on. Grandpa Ellen uses his little playing cards to take the children soaring through human history to find answers! 
(translated from iqiyi)

Ai Ni.title: Ai Ni
Ai Ni.detail: Two vendors, one old and one young, sit on both sides of a big tree and sell apples. The apples sold by the old are big and red, and the apples sold by the young look good. In fact, there are many holes. With a kind face, customers gradually flocked to the old man's booth. In order to sell the apples, the young man lowered the price and re-placed the apples, showing only the good side. This really attracted many customers. When the two returned home by ferry after doing business, the young people tried to take advantage of the old people everywhere. When the ferry was interrupted by a rush of waves, the two and the boatman fell into the water. The old man felt that the purse was too heavy and discarded it. The young man hurriedly picked it up regardless of his life.(source:douban)

Ai Ni Zhidao Shijie Jintou.title: Ai Ni Zhidao Shijie Jintou
Ai Ni Zhidao Shijie Jintou.detail:
Wang Ba Di is the designer of the photo studio (actually it is a P picture). He is withdrawn in appearance but sullen on the inside and is keen to spit out his stomach. He has an amazing special skill: Anything with texture, he can see the pattern and associate it, and come up with a scene and a story. When he broke up with Mu Bei, he was treated for his emotional injury at his brother Wang Xiaolan's house. The frustrated and sloppy traveled in his dreams all day long, contemplating the illusion of happiness with his girlfriend Mu Bei. Under the stimulation of Wang Xiaolan, he determined to contact Mubei again. Will he wait until Mubei's arrival, worrying, what kind of mysterious identity will Wang Xiaolan, who is in the shadows, have?
(translated from douban)

Ai Shimai 2: Futari no Kajitsu.detail:

(Source: ANN)

Ai Shimai Tsubomi... Kegashite Kudasai.title: Ai Shimai Tsubomi... Kegashite Kudasai
Ai Shimai Tsubomi... Kegashite Kudasai.detail:
Katori is attracted to an enigmatic new student at her University named Koshiro. She remembers his face from when he saved her younger sister from a band of rapists in the past. However, rumours abound that Koshiro is sleeping with his teachers, and has some kind of hidden agenda against the school and her mother. When Koshiro's plan goes into motion, Katori, her sister, and her mother will all be in on the action.

(Source: ANN)

Ai Shimai: Futari no Kajitsu.title: Ai Shimai: Futari no Kajitsu
Ai Shimai: Futari no Kajitsu.detail:
Takedo Nogawa is the spoiled son of a wealthy industrialist. When he was younger, he was infatuated with Yumi Okamoto, his father's personal secretary. But as she was also his father's personal sex toy, Yumi was off limits for Takedo.

After he gets into a traffic accident with Yukie Kitazawa, an average housewife, Takedo sees an opportunity to one-up his old man. Per a contract drawn up by Yumi, Takedo allows Yukie to waive her legal fees if she becomes his sex slave.

Not to be outdone, the elder Nogawa sicks his secretary on Yukie's teenage daughters, using the contract to exploit them for his own twisted desires. A sick game ensues as father and son compete to strip the Kitazawa women of their dignity. Ai Shimai: Futari no Kajitsu is a story of power and those who abuse it.

Aikagi The Animation.title: Aikagi The Animation
Aikagi The Animation.detail:
It was the last winter of his school life and with entrance exams and graduation edging closer, Nozomu didn't know what to do. He was told to become independent, but he couldn't find a suitable place to live by himself. His childhood friend Shiori couldn't stand watching him in his current state and suggested that he live with her. While he thought that it wouldn't really make him independent, his parents readily agreed to the idea. Before he knew it, they were living together under the same roof.

Their cohabitation was only to last one month. Since it's only for a short period and she's his childhood friend, he thought that nothing wrong will happen. However, living together with Shiori revealed to him aside which he hadn't seen before, and he began to see her as a woman. Where will their relationship end up now that he had begun to have feelings for her?

(Source: vndb)

The snow in the North Pole... the summer sun, the always cold North Pole. But the Eskimo girl did not feel sad or bored. Every day of her is a wonderful adventure, and these are extraordinary gifts for her. What will the next day bring? Will you bring her a phonograph and a life raft today? Akiko.detail:
Young men and women are supposed to be interested in the opposite sex. They're supposed to be interested in sex, period. But the students at the prestigious Nobel Academy have been exhibiting unusually strong urges lately.

When one of the female scholars spends her entire summer vacation masturbating in her room, her father calls on the Central Genetic Research Institute for help. Special Agent Akiko is assigned to investigate forthwith, and goes "undercover" to discover exactly what possesses the student body.

(Source: AniDB)

Akina to Onsen de H Shiyo!.detail:
Miyazawa Akina is the captain of a college softball team who has just hit a string of good luck. Her team has won the tournament, her love life is progressing well and her childhood friend has now become her boyfriend, and she recently won two tickets to a nearby hot springs. In high spirits, she fully intends to relax and celebrate her victories, but she might not be able to get much rest in such a romantic location, alone with the man she loves.

(Source: ANN)

Akuma-kun (Shin Anime).title: Akuma-kun (Shin Anime)
Akuma-kun (Shin Anime).detail:
When Mr. Satou, a company employee at the world's largest electronics company, is called upon by his boss to tutor his only son in exchange for a high ranking position within the organization, things couldn't have been peachier. At least, that's what he thought...

Little did he know that his student was Ichirou Matsushita, a young boy with the mind of a genius and a terrifying hidden agenda. It doesn't take long for Satou to realize that he is the second home tutor in as many weeks that has been sent to teach the little boy. What's even more unnerving is that the previous Tutor's whereabouts appear to be a mystery...

The little boy's true identity is revealed when he puts Satou under a curse, turning him into a lizard man and making him one of servants. Little Ichirou Matsushita is none other than "Akuma-kun" boy genius and master of black magic. His goal? To open the portal between hell and earth, summon forth hell's most powerful demons, and enlist their help in taking over the world!

Ala Da De Qimiao Shijie.title: Ala Da De Qimiao Shijie
Ala Da De Qimiao Shijie.detail:
The story takes place on the present earth. There is a forest not far from the city. There is a lush and magical tree in the forest. There are a group of kind and brave green elves living in the tree. They have their own names. ——The long-winded but caring Elf Elders, the brave and strong Alpha, the kind and clever boy, the naughty and clever Mumu, the beautiful and intelligent Ami and the innocent and lovely Nini, they together form the happy green elves family . Every green elf has a healthy, positive, and constantly upward mentality. They also have joy, anger, sorrow, and joy like children. They have to learn, like to play, and are innocent and naughty. The difference is that green elf has wings to fly, superpowers and battle magic.
(translated from )

Ali Baba 2 Suoluomen Fengyin.title: Ali Baba 2 Suoluomen Fengyin
Ali Baba 2 Suoluomen Fengyin.detail:
After leaving the treasure house world, Alibaba (voiced by Ding Yan), Margina (voiced by Ye Fang) and Xiaozhizhi (voiced by Sun Ke) once again joined hands on a new journey. This time, their goal was to find the long-lost treasure of Solomon, and Alibaba accidentally obtained an ancient book that recorded the hidden location of the treasure. However, in the process of searching for the treasure, Ali Baba accidentally broke the seal that restricted the devil, making the devil haunt the world again. The devil, who has been imprisoned for hundreds of years, is full of anger and desire for revenge. He wants to recover everything from humans.
　　 In order to make up for their mistakes, Alibaba and his team began to look for a sealed bottle that could re-seal the devil. What they didn't expect was that the sealed bottle fell into the hands of their old rival robber trio.(translated from douban)

Ali Baba Dadao Qibing.title: Ali Baba Dadao Qibing
Ali Baba Dadao Qibing.detail:
In the middle of the 15th century, the richest adventure kingdom on the Central Continent circulated a legend about the king's heart-as long as you find the king's heart, you can become a king. Princess Margina has never had a real adventure because of her cowardly nature. Everyone in the adventure kingdom knows her as the "coward princess". She has been working hard to inherit the throne, but she was questioned at the ball where the king announced her successor. She wanted to become the king and decided to prove herself. She escaped from the ball and became a partner with the slum boy Ali Baba. Together with Alibaba, his "Treasure Hunting Guide" entered the mysterious and exciting world of treasure trove and embarked on a journey to find the heart of the king.
Entering the treasury with them is a trio of robbers who do no evil. They conquered the mirror monsters and formed a powerful gang of forty thieves. The robber boss wants to get the king's heart to establish a robber kingdom, and the unpredictable danger will face the princess and Ali. Baba approached step by step.
　　 In the end, the princess and her team passed the dangers of the treasure house, and Alibaba realized his wish to defeat the robbers. The princess got the heart of the king, and also understood the abilities most needed to become a king, and grew up in the adventure.
(translated from douban)

Ali Baba Sangen Jinfa.title: Ali Baba Sangen Jinfa
Ali Baba Sangen Jinfa.detail:
The sealed demon king awakened again, and the robber Farruger learned that Xiaozhizhi was the key to completely lifting the seal and sent his men to search around. Can Xiaozhizhi escape? In order to help good friends, Alibaba, who returned from the adventure, embarked on an adventurous journey again. Clouds enveloped the earth. What will be waiting for him this time?
(translated from douban)

Ali Baba Yu Shen Deng.title: Ali Baba Yu Shen Deng
Ali Baba Yu Shen Deng.detail:
Robber's Scimitar was in the legendary desert ruins-Azrod. When digging for treasures, he accidentally alarmed the nightmare in the seal. The nightmare bewitched the scimitar to open the seal, and the nightmare once again resurrected and darkness fell.
　　The seal master Xiao Zhizhi was invited to participate in the auction. A treasure chest from Azrod suddenly released the curse of nightmare, dragging Xiao Zhizhi into a terrible dream.
　　 In order to save Xiaozhizhi’s Ali Baba, he went through the Adventure Collection and judged from the prophecy that the nightmare seal had been loosened, and the terrifying monster was about to be born, and it must be stopped immediately.
　　 After learning this news, Aladdin, a rookie in the adventure world, made a battle with Alibaba. Whoever defeats the Nightmare Lord first, who is the strongest adventurer, begins a competition concerning the reputation of adventurers.
　　 The resurrected Nightmare Lord releases dark energy, turning the scimitar into an invulnerable monster. Ali Baba and Aladdin teamed up to defeat the Scimitar, and finally, with the cooperation of the magic lamp elves and Xiao Sesame, sealed the nightmare again, and the world returned to peace.(translated from douban)

Amakano.detail:
It's only the end of November and the hot springs town Yomase-machi was already a winter wonderland, having been dyed white from the falling snow. Yuuki moved to this snowy town to help his grandparents shovel snow at their home, the former boarding house Yamanouchi-sou. He met many warm-hearted people, including the shrine maiden Sayuki who worries about her inability to properly greet strangers, his mysterious but playful housemate and senpai Mizuki, and the local café's cheerful and energetic kouhai mascot Koharu. Even though he was still feeling lost, he tried to get used to living in this snowy land. During that time, his grandfather suggested that he find love while he is still young and lead a new life in earnest. Now's the time for him to take the first step and fall in love.

(Source: VNDB)

Ane Yome Quartet.title: Ane Yome Quartet
Ane Yome Quartet.detail:
Based of the game by Candy Soft. Summary of the game:

The Hanabishi family and Hidaka family are next door neighbors.
The fathers of both households could be called best friends, so they all get along like one big happy family. In particular, Hidaka family’s only son Kouki was raised lovingly by the four Hanabishi sisters like he was their own brother. 
One day, the Hanabishi and Hidaka parents were preparing for a long term overseas business trip together. Kantaro Hanabishi had only one problem holding him back from the trip; leaving his four daughters behind in Japan. 
“Leave it to me. You can rely on me to watch over them!”
As a result of Kouki’s casual announcement, both parents happily departed on their trip.
“Ooh, how reliable! That was what I was waiting to hear!”
Between both of the parents, they had arranged for one of the four sisters to become Kouki's fiance.
After Kouki's graduation they would continue discussion of it further, but this recent event gave a chance to accelerate their plan.

Thus, all summer vacation Kouki will spend time alone under one roof with all four of the Hanabishi sisters.

The eldest daughter Yurina: Despite being good at her job, While at home she lazes around and makes Kouki work hard. 
The second born daughter, Momone: Absolutely adores Kouki, and does nothing but spoil him. 
The third daughter, Saori: She does all the housework, and although she is like a maid she prefers it to going outside. 
The youngest daughter, Anzu: Has no reservation in calling Kouki her personal play toy. 

Each of them have their own motives doing anything they can; at times even tempting him into sexual situations, so they can draw closer to making the Kouki they love their husband.
If Kouki ever chooses a bride, who will it be?
The energetic life with the quartet of sisters is about to begin.

(Source: VNDB)

Angel Blade.detail:
The surface of Earth has been rendered unlivable. Due to years upon years of pollution, humanity has been forced to build cities to rise above the planet's filthy surface and adapt to this new way of life. Not only this, but there is also a thriving kingdom of mutants lurking below the billowing clouds of smog and pollution.

The leader of these mutated monstrosities is a powerful, busty woman known as Phantom Lady. She dispatches her minions to attack the people above, taking advantage of and raping young women. The police are fully aware of these demon rapists, but know nothing of their origins or how to stop them. Their only hope lays within their city's mysterious, magical, and sexually explicit savior, Angel Blade. With her deadly sword, provocative costume, and strong sense of justice, this jiggling juggernaut of justice will appear whenever necessary to vanquish the Phantom Lady's demonic horde－if she can gain control of her hormones, that is!
